visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual rice export quantities vs model predictions with ideal prediction line

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Histogram showing distribution of prediction errors (actual - predicted)

insights: - Model has extremely high prediction error (MAPE: 19664.55%)
- Residuals show large variance (329.64) with positive bias
- Only 5 data points limit statistical significance
data.summary: The Random Forest model cannot reliably predict rice export quantities to Bangladesh with the current data and features. Predictions have an average error of 171.68 units and a massive percentage error of 19,664.55%.
data.task_answer: The Random Forest model cannot reliably predict rice export quantities to Bangladesh with the current data and features. Predictions have an average error of 171.68 units and a massive percentage error of 19,664.55%.
